data.text:
@nzherald Provoked violence by the authorities, everybody asleep
We are in a sad state, when there's more and more cases of people getting sick from that unknown stuff they vaccinate people with we still believe that they are doing this for our health? 😂
@stevesolomons @nzherald No they are not. But neither are the unsubstantiated claims the media is making. Doesn't stop them doing it though.

@JenThePadawan @nzherald Exactly this is what tyrants do.  She used the traitors to over run peaceful protesters who had every right to be there.  I will always refer to the police as TRAITORS because they have betrayed the people who pay their wages and who expect them to help the people.

@nzherald Welcome to Ardern's NZ. Where it's perfectly fine for police to punch old men. 

https://t.co/lch2Qa9EWk
@AghasteTrulye @nzherald Brags on FB are not, on their own, evidence of anything

@Jonboywell @nzherald You really are a dumb cunt. 
you on a fantasy rant now are you.

@Jonboywell @nzherald Thanks for confirming your virtue signalling, by telling me how great you are. I wonder why I don't think of doing that. Oh, that's because I'm not a vapid virtue signaller. 

Maybe, learn how to read data clown, so you don't look stupid.

@Jonboywell @nzherald Not old data, you just don't understand it I suppose.

The selfish one is you. Empty virtue signalling isn't a virtue.
